headline: Shareholder Probes of MOH Cost Assumptions Could Be A Game Changer For Molina Healthcare
summary: In recent months, Molina Healthcare has faced shareholder class action investigations alleging that management misrepresented medical cost trends, premium rate alignment, and the sustainability of its financial guidance for fiscal 2025. These legal challenges highlight how sensitive Molina’s business model may be to assumptions around healthcare utilization and the transparency of its cost projections. We’ll now explore how the investigations into Molina’s medical cost assumptions and...
